NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
​ DocumentReference
​ identifier S0..1
​ status S1..1Binding: DocumentReferenceStatus (required)
​ type S1..1Binding: US Core DocumentReference Type (required)
Min Binding: US Core Clinical Note Type
​ category S1..*Binding: US Core DocumentReference Category (extensible)
​ subject S1..1Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-patient)
​ date S0..1
​ author S0..*Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-practitioner | http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-practitionerrole | US Core Organization Profile | Device | http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-patient | RelatedPerson)
​ custodian SReference(US Core Organization Profile)
​ content S1..1
​ attachment SI1..1us-core-6: DocumentReference.content.attachment.url or DocumentReference.content.attachment.data or both SHALL be present.
​ contentType S1..1
​ data SI0..1
​ url SI0..1
​ format S0..1Binding: DocumentReferenceFormatCodeSet (extensible)
​ context S0..1
​ encounter S0..1Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-encounter)
​ period S
